sql-script.tran-sql: create table sf_attachment ( id char(32) not null, contentid char(32) not null, userid char(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, md5 char(32) not null, topic varchar(128) not null, attachtype int2 not null, attachsize int8 not null, videotime int4 not null, durl varchar(128), fileext varchar(16), downloads int4 not null, description varchar(256), oorder int4 not null, primary key(id) );
